event = {
	id = 655500
	random = no
	country = VEN
	style = 2

	name = "Venezuela's place in the world"
	desc = "By 1936, Venezuela has grown heavily divided between three parties. Nevertheless, Venezuela is one of the few relatively stable and democratic nations in the region, but escalating tensions around the globe could easily destabilise the nascent democracy"
	picture = "politics2"

	date = { day = 4 month = february year = 1948 }

	action_a = {
		name = "We do live in Interesting Times"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655501
	random = no
	country = VEN
	style = 2

	name = "Influence of the Military"
	desc = "The Venezuelan military has had significant influence in politics for decades. After all, they were in power under The Catfish and were the ones to depose him and restore democracy. They are the nation's guardians and will not hesitate to act if they believe it to be endangered."
	picture = "politics3"

	date = { day = 4 month = march year = 1948 }

	action_a = {
		name = "May our armies remain strong"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655502
	random = no
	country = VEN
	style = 2

	name = "Oil Addiction"
	desc = "Venezuela is hopelessly addicted to black gold, oil. It is the centre of the country's economy and its source of wealth. There is little incentive for people to invest in other industries, leave the nation vulnerable to the so-called Dutch Disease."
	picture = "venezuelan_oil"

	date = { day = 4 month = june year = 1948 }

	action_a = {
		name = "More! More! I need more of that Black Gold!"
		command = { type = building_prod_mod which = ic value = -10 } #regular build-time +10%
		command = { type = trigger which = 655503 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655503
	random = no
	country = VEN
	style = 2

	name = "Dominance of Foreign Oil Companies"
	desc = "The vast majority of the country's oil wells are in the hands of foreign companies from the successors of Standard Oil and Royal Dutch Shell. Part of the wealth they generate will never be in the hands of our people."
	picture = "politics2"

	action = {
		name = "There is no way this could end badly for us."
		command = { type = relation which = HOL value = 25 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 25 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655504
	country = VEN
	picture = "gold"
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		flag = COL_Communist
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 25
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1960 }

	name = "Revolt in Caracas"
	desc = "Neighboring Colombia have been taken over by Communist governments, which has caused the air here in Venezuela to be tense. Along side the mountains are giant barrios where life is a struggle for everyday people."

	action_a = {
		name = "A Wind of Change will blow"
		command = { type = setflag which = VEN_SOCIALIST }
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655505
	country = VEN
	picture = "gold"
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		flag = VEN_SOCIALIST
		random = 20
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1948 }
	offset = 20
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1960 }

	name = "Revolucion"
	desc = "A Mass Protest turned into an Angry Mob as the people came down from the barrios on the mountain side to protest and demand a new constitution that was voted against yesterday. Encouraged by the governments of Bolivia and Brasil, they have repeated the pattern and surrounded the Presidential Palace."

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "Give into their Demands!"		
		command = { type = dissent value = 10 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 655506 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "Crush this Rebellion!"
		command = { type = clrflag which = VEN_SOCIALIST }
		command = { type = dissent value = 35 }
		command = { type = 	province_revoltrisk which = -1 value = 100 }
		command = { type = 	province_revoltrisk which = -1 value = 100 }
		command = { type = 	province_revoltrisk which = -1 value = 100 }
		command = { type = 	province_revoltrisk which = -1 value = 100 }
		command = { type = 	province_revoltrisk which = -1 value = 100 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655506
	country = VEN
	picture = "gold"
	style = 2

	name = "The Revolutionary Government of Venezuela"
	desc = "Jovito Villalba forms his cabinet."

	action = {
		name = "Jovito Villalba and the Partido Obrero Socialista de Venezuela"

		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 3 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = free_market value = 1 }

		command = { type = headofstate which = 180077 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 180072 }
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 180073 }
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 180075 }
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 180042 }

		command = { type = dissent value = -10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655507
	country = VEN
	style = 2
	picture = "southamerica"

	trigger =  {
		flag = VEN_SOCIALIST
		flag = COL_Communist
		government = communist
		NOT = {
			ispuppet = VEN
			atwar = VEN
		}
		exists = ARG
		exists = BRA
		exists = COL
	}

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1949 }
	offset = 50
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = december year = 1960 }

	name = "Alliance with Colombia ?"
	desc = "The world is a dangerous place, so we need alliances with sworn enemies of the capitalism. Venezuela and Colombia could benefit from joining forces in a crusade for a new, brave world. "

	action = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "Propose an Alliance with Colombia"
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		command = { type = trigger which = 655508 } # Colombian response
	}

	action = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "Rather not"
		command = { type = relation which = COL value = -10 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655508
	country = COL
	style = 2
	picture = "southamerica"

	name = "Alliance with Venezuela ?"
	desc = "Venezuela has proposed an axis be formed, a defensive alliance between Colombia and Venezuela against capitalist menace. What should we tell them?"

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 95
		name = "Accept their offer !"
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = 1 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = alliance which = VEN }
		command = { type = relation which = VEN value = 50 }
		command = { type = relation which = ARG value = -10 }
	}

	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 5
		name = "It's not necessary"
		command = { type = domestic which = interventionism value = -1 }
		command = { type = relation which = VEN value = -25 }
		command = { type = relation which = ARG value = 10 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655509
	country = VEN
	style = 2
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 5 month = april year = 1951 }

	name = "The Venezuelan Oil Industry"
	desc = "Oil has always been a chief export of Venezula, as far back as we can remember. It has been proposed that we take the Oil Industry from the hands of foreign companies and sell the oil to them ourselves. Our profits would increase and we would have taken another step towards true independence and self dependence."

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 90
		name = "The Oil Refined Here is Ours, Nationalize!,"
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 2 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
		command = { type = supplies value = -500 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = relation which = HOL value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = CAN value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = RSI value = -10 }
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = -10 }
		command = { type = free_oil value = 5  }
		command = { type = free_money value = 3 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 10
		name = "We would not want to upset foreign interests"
		command = { type = relation which = HOL value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ENG value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = SPR value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = POR value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = GER value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = FRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = USA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = CAN value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = ITA value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = RSI value = 5 }
		command = { type = relation which = BRA value = 5 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655510
	country = VEN
	random = no
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				headofstate = 38016 #Isa?as Medina Angarita
				ispuppet = VEN
			}
		}
	}

	name = "The 1951 Presidental election"
	desc = "While currently the President is elected by the Legislature, it's not any easier than a national election and therefore anyone can win. However, there is onyl two canidates in this election, either Romulo Gallegos Freire or the current President with the former likely going to win..."
	picture = "politics3"

	date = { day = 1 month = may year = 1951 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = may year = 1951 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 80
		name = "Romulo Gallegos Freire is our man!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 180078 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 180014 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 6 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 20
		name = "The current President is fine"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655511
	country = VEN
	random = no
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		headofstate = 180078
		NOT = { ispuppet = VEN }
	}

	name = "A day in Autumn"
	desc = "With Romulo Gallegos Freire having been our President for some time now, his policies have increasling pleased no one. Because of this, critics of him have begun plotting a coup detat headed by R?mulo Betancourt..."
	picture = "news_paper"

	date = { day = 1 month = may year = 1951 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 29 month = may year = 1951 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 75
		name = "R?mulo Betancourt takes over!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 180012 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 180014 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 7 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 25
		name = "Medina Angarita continues to lead the nation"
		command = { type = dissent value = 1 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655512
	country = VEN
	random = no
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		NOT = { ispuppet = VEN }
	}

	name = "The 1955 Presidental election"
	desc = "This election will go down in Venezulan history because this is the first election the people directly elect the President! Because the Social Democrats forced this and other social reforms, they are viewed quite with high regard by the people and are likely to be the Christian Democrats..."
	picture = "election"

	date = { day = 15 month = december year = 1954 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = january year = 1955 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 70
		name = "The Social Democrats win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 180012 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 180014 }
		#command = { type = foreignminister which = 38040 } #Carlos Morales Acorzia
		#command = { type = armamentminister which = 38051 } #Jose Vicente Rangel
		#command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38061 } #Concepcion Quijada Gonzalez
		#command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 38070 } #Luis Monsalvo Mareno
		#command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 38077 } #Ra?l Leoni Otero
		#command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 38082 } #Nelson Verde Graterol
		#command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 38090 } #Antonio Casas Gonzalez
		#command = { type = chiefofair which = 38096 } #Jos? Polares Pavon
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 9 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "The Christian Democrats win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 188080 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 188013 }
		#command = { type = foreignminister which = 38041 } #Gonzalo Barrios
		#command = { type = armamentminister which = 38050 } #Julio Garcia Jarpa
		#command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38063 } #Isidoro Ruiz Tuerro
		#command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 38071 } #Robert Letts Sanchez
		#command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 38076 } #Gustavo Gonzalez Lopez
		#command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 38081 } #Tomas Contreras Villalobos
		#command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 38089 } #Carlos Ramos D?az
		#command = { type = chiefofair which = 38095 } #Miguel D?az Fraile
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 4 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
	}
}


event = {
	id = 655513
	country = VEN
	random = no
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		NOT = { ispuppet = VEN }
	}

	name = "The 1959 Presidental election"
	desc = "It is time for the next Presidential election. The radicals of the Social Democrats, discontent with the relative moderation of the party, split and formed their own Syndicalist party. However, it is much more likely for the weakened Social Democrats or even the Christians to win..."
	picture = "election"

	date = { day = 15 month = december year = 1958 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = january year = 1959 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "The Social Democrats win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 180012 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 180014 }
		#command = { type = foreignminister which = 38040 } #Carlos Morales Acorzia
		#command = { type = armamentminister which = 38051 } #Jose Vicente Rangel
		#command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38061 } #Concepcion Quijada Gonzalez
		#command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 38070 } #Luis Monsalvo Mareno
		#command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 38077 } #Ra?l Leoni Otero

		#command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 38090 } #Antonio Casas Gonzalez
		#command = { type = chiefofair which = 38096 } #Jos? Polares Pavon

		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "The Christian Democrats win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 188080 }
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 188013 }

		#command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38063 } #Isidoro Ruiz Tuerro

		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 4 }

event = {
	id = 655514
	country = VEN
	random = no
	style = 2

	trigger = {
		government = democratic
		NOT = { ispuppet = VEN }
	}

	name = "The 1961 Presidental election"
	desc = "Wow... did you really play till 1961 as Venezula? Regardless, the three political parties all have essentially the same chance of winning..."
	picture = "election"

	date = { day = 15 month = december year = 1960 }
	offset = 15
	deathdate = { day = 15 month = january year = 1961 }

	action_a = {
		ai_chance = 35
		name = "The Social Democrats win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 38019 } #R?mulo Gallegos Freire
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 38031 } #R?mulo Gallegos Freire
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 38040 } #Carlos Morales Acorzia
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 38051 } #Jose Vicente Rangel
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38061 } #Concepcion Quijada Gonzalez
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 38070 } #Luis Monsalvo Mareno
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 38077 } #Ra?l Leoni Otero
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 38082 } #Nelson Verde Graterol
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 38090 } #Antonio Casas Gonzalez
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 38096 } #Jos? Polares Pavon
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 9 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 8 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
	}
	action_b = {
		ai_chance = 35
		name = "The Christian Democrats win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 38018 } #Rafael Caldera
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 38030 } #Rafael Caldera
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 38041 } #Gonzalo Barrios
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 38050 } #Julio Garcia Jarpa
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38063 } #Isidoro Ruiz Tuerro
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 38071 } #Robert Letts Sanchez
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 38076 } #Gustavo Gonzalez Lopez
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 38081 } #Tomas Contreras Villalobos
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 38089 } #Carlos Ramos D?az
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 38095 } #Miguel D?az Fraile
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 8 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 4 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = 1 }
	}
	action_c = {
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "The Syndicalists win it!"
		command = { type = headofstate which = 38023 } #Wolfgang Larraz?bal Ugueto
		command = { type = headofgovernment which = 38034 } #Wolfgang Larraz?bal Ugueto
		command = { type = foreignminister which = 38037 } #Pedro Leon Castro
		command = { type = armamentminister which = 38051 } #Jose Vicente Rangel
		command = { type = ministerofsecurity which = 38062 } #Adolfo Gonzalez Aquilar
		command = { type = ministerofintelligence which = 38065 } #Pedro Leon Castro
		command = { type = chiefofstaff which = 38074 } #Antonio Casas Gonzalez
		command = { type = chiefofarmy which = 38084 } #Wolfgang Larraz?bal Ugueto
		command = { type = chiefofnavy which = 38090 } #Antonio Casas Gonzalez
		command = { type = chiefofair which = 38092 } #Humberto S. Torres Vilera
		command = { type = set_domestic which = democratic value = 4 }
		command = { type = set_domestic which = political_left value = 7 }
		command = { type = domestic which = free_market value = -2 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 655515
	random = no
	country = VEN
	style = 2

	trigger = { headofstate = 38020 } #Carlos Delgado Chalbaud

	name = "Carlos Delgado Chalbaud has died!"
	desc = "Carlos Delgado Chalbaud, our President has died! A week of mourning has been declared and German Suarez Flamerich has become the interm President."
	picture = "minister_died"

	date = { year = 1950 month = november day = 13 }

	action_a = {
		name = "Memento mori"
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 38020 } #Carlos Delgado Chalbaud
		command = { type = sleepminister which = 38079 } #Carlos Delgado Chalbaud
		command = { type = sleepleader which = 270004 } #Carlos Delgado Chalbaud
		command = { type = headofstate which = 38021 } #German Suarez Flamerich
	}
}
